article.title: Lockheed to Modernize Apache Target Acquisition for Saudi Arabia
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Lockheed Martin Missiles and Fire Control, Orlando, Florida, was awarded a $66,619,041 firm-fixed-price and cost-plus-fixed-fee contract for AH-64D Apache modernized target acquisition designation sight/pilot's night vision sensor systems and spares for the Saudi Arabia National Guard.Â The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Redstone Arsenal, Alabama, is the contracting activity.
